name: Ch18ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Artur;It's so hot here...|This volcano is more intense than I expected.
speak;Artur;Good thing I can use my ice magic to cool down a bit.
speak;Artur;Ah, much better!|A little snow goes a long way in this heat.
speak;Marisa;That's a useful ability to have.
speak;Artur;Thank you, Marisa!|It's one of the benefits of my study of light magic.
speak;Artur;You look warm as well.|Would you like me to cool you down too?
speak;Artur;Are you sure?|It's really no trouble at all.
speak;Marisa;I said I'm fine.|I've trained in worse conditions.
speak;Artur;Very well.|I should check on the others.|Excuse me, Marisa.
